name: LUL Me
author: Arun Kumar

sections.description:
Lock your content/youtube video/etc behind paywall. Reveal content after user payment.

Let your audience reveal part of your blog post content OR youtube video (unlisted) OR Anything by paying you a price set by you during post publish.

Hiding content behind paywall is very simple using shortcode:

This is free content for my audience

[ppv price=”5″]

This is paid content for my audience, visible only after purchase.

[/ppv]

–What you can hide behind paywall:–

  • Answer to solve a user question (Paid answers)

  • Part of your blog post content.

  • Youtube video (unlisted)

  • Code snippets

  • Google drive / Dropbox / One drive: file links (aka download links)

……….etc

–Payment modes:–

Currently we have two payment options for your audience:

  • PayPal: For Global audience

  • Instamojo: For Indian audience

–Who we are:–

We are like you, You can think of us as a blogger/marketer/developer/etc.

We want to see you making money from day 1, without depending on approval policies of Google, YouTube or anyone.

ENJOY!

ðŸ˜€
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

  2. Search for LUL ME.

  3. Click Install Now next to the LUL ME plugin.

  4. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is there any external service used in plugin ?

Yes, Your content is checkout at LockUnlock.ME

What data is sent from my site to external service ?

  • Your Post id, its Permalink, its Title, and Price set in Shortcode.

Anything else I must know ?

  • We also removed Content from feed, excerpt rss & WP REST API, So that content can only be seen after purchase.

  • Read more here: Privacy policy
